channel.title: Need help with making a PK-zone
channel.description:
Need help with making a PK-zone like ::pkbox, i saw on a server there was ::pkbox @ the ranged guild.
Thanks!

item.title: Need help with making a PK-zone
item.dc:creator: @nd_w0t nd w0t
item.description:
@nd_w0t wrote:

Kk add this to your commands…

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“fight”))
{
teleportToX = 2536;
teleportToY = 3306;
inwildy = false;
sendMessage(“Enjoy your pking,owning and slaughtering!! mwuhahaha! =)”);
}

Thats a pking command. When u compiled type ::fight and u should teleport
=)

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with making a PK-zone
